title: The Great Lemon Bake-Off
description: Skylar and Trey are cousins who spend two weeks each summer visiting their grandparents. With the help of their grandma and grandpa, the cousins have a friendly bake-off, inspired by the lemons in their grandparents' backyard. The Great Lemon Bake-Off is an entertaining story about Trey and Skylar's tasty competition. The book can also be used to teach students how to effectively sequence events and summarize.
highFrequencyWords: arranged, challenge, decision, gasped, judge, murmured, recipes, whisk, zest
